div.p: ActiveMQ uses slf4j as its logging framework. This allows ActiveMQ to support MDC logging. For more information about about MDC logging see the logback manual.
Currently ActiveMQ adds three keys to the diagnostic context:

td.p: Name of the broker logging event.
Address of the connector which is serving the request.
Name of the target destination of a message.
